title: NVDY: Speculative High Yield Buy On AI Growth (NYSEARCA:NVDY)
description: Despite a 30% price drop, NVDY's massive trailing yield delivered a strong total return, appealing to income-focused investors over NVIDIA's very low dividend. Read the full analysis here.
content:
Are you getting a piece of the AI action? While tech companies generally don't pay attractive dividends, there are many funds that are invested in AI giant NVIDIA ( NVDA ), which has become the

Our Marketplace service, Hidden Dividend Stocks Plus, focuses on undercovered, undervalued income vehicles, and special high yield situations.

We scour the US and world markets to find solid income opportunities with dividend yields ranging from 6% to 10%-plus, backed by strong earnings.

We publish exclusive articles each week with investing ideas for the HDS+ site that you won't see anywhere else.

We just closed a position in August 2025 with a 36%-plus total return from inception.
summary: Inventive Dividend Stocks Plus, a Marketplace service that publishes exclusive articles and information on undervalued and high yield situations, aims to find high-value value in the US and world markets. The service has invested heavily in AI technology, with many of its members focusing on the future of the industry.
shortSummary: The article: "Numerous" (Numerous) is the title of bestseller of 2017, with potential for future success in the event of a successful crowdfunding campaign by Amazon.com.
